title: Pelosi and Florida
sub_head: Whenever it’s time to hand over the gavel, why not head to the Sunshine State?
body:
A popular online rumor holding that Speaker of the House Nancy Pelosi (D., Calif.) has bought a beachfront mansion in taxpayer-friendly Florida appears to be false. But that doesn’t mean Mrs. Pelosi should rule out a move southward whenever she gives up the speaker’s gavel, perhaps in January of 2023. A burgeoning effort by Sen. Bernie Sanders (Socialist, Vt.) to negotiate tax relief for well-heeled property owners like himself won’t necessarily help the much wealthier Pelosi household. Also, a new report makes a strong economic case for a Pelosi escape to the Sunshine State.
As for the rumor, Alexandra Clough of the Palm Beach Post informs:
